instruction: Give an example of a time where it is appropriate to ask for help.
output: It is appropriate to ask for help when you need to fix something you know nothing about, when you are feeling overwhelmed, when you are feeling stuck on a project, when you need advice or guidance on a decision, or when you are not feeling well or emotionally drained.

instruction: Translate the word 'happiness' into Spanish.
Name four properties of sound.
output: Four properties of sound are pitch, intensity, timbre, and reverberation.

instruction: Suggest an effective way to use technology to make business meetings more efficient.
output: One effective way to use technology to make business meetings more efficient is to use virtual meeting platforms such as Zoom and Google Hangouts. This allows participants to easily join the meeting and present their ideas in visual formats like presentations, videos, and documents. Additionally, shared whiteboard applications can facilitate collaborative decision making, and the ability to record meetings allows for quick review afterwards.

instruction: Design a creative way to end a story.
output: The story ended with a surprise twist - just when the protagonist thought everything had been lost, it turned out that the darkness of the night was only a cover for the coming dawn, and a new beginning awaited her.

instruction: Develop a role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
output: The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic world decades after a mysterious event caused society to collapse and devolve into small, isolated communities. Players take on the role of survivors and explore a massive, open world in search of resources and other survivors to form alliances with. They must craft weapons, build shelters, and hunt wildlife to survive while also avoiding bandits, mutants, and other dangers.

instruction: Use the data below to find the population density of the country.
input:
Country: India
Population: 1.314 billion
Land area: 3.287 million square kilometers
output: The population density of India is 397.46 people per square kilometer.

instruction: Transform a positive statement into a negative one.
Calculate the compound interest for a deposit of 500 dollars at 3% for 10 years.
output: The compound interest for a deposit of 500 dollars at 3% for 10 years is 635.81 dollars.

instruction: Name one important consequence of deforestation.
output: One important consequence of deforestation is the loss of habitat and species diversity.

instruction: Express the following as a ratio.
Generate a story about a friend's experience with a mysterious creature.
output: My friend was walking late one night when they spotted a mysterious creature in the distance. As they got closer, they could see it was a large, furry creature with glowing eyes, but it seemed to be just standing there as still as a statue. They cautiously approached it, wondering if it was friendly or hostile. The creature seemed to sense my friend's presence and, without warning, it screeched and sprinted away into the darkness.

instruction: Give an example of data to support the following statement: "More people are getting vaccinated."
output: According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the number of people getting vaccinated against the flu has increased by 10% year-on-year since 2016.

instruction: Summarize the passage in two lines.
input: Coffee is one of the most popular and widely consumed beverages around the world. It is believed to be the worldâ€™s second most traded commodity, just behind oil. People have been consuming coffee for hundreds of years, even though it was initially used as a medical beverage.
output: Coffee is one of the most beloved beverages worldwide and is the second most traded commodity after oil. For centuries, it has been consumed both for pleasure and medicinal purposes.

instruction: Write the past tense for the word "write".
Provide three examples of synonyms for the word "beautiful".
output: Three synonyms for the word "beautiful" include: attractive, exquisite, and gorgeous.

instruction: Compare and contrast the features of two popular social media sites.
output: Two popular social media sites, Facebook and Twitter, have some similar features, such as the ability to post and share content, comment on posts/tweets, and interact with other users. However, they also have differences. On Twitter, users are limited to 280 characters per tweet, whereas Facebook users have no character limit. Additionally, Twitter operates in a more chronological fashion, while Facebook prioritizes content based on algorithms and user engagement.

instruction: Find an example of a company that has significant market power.
output: Apple Inc. is an example of a company that has significant market power. With its strong brand recognition and sizeable market share, it has been able to effectively set higher prices and outcompete its competitors in a number of industries.

instruction: Select an appropriate sentiment label to describe the text.
input: He was so excited to see the puppies.

instruction: Write a list of 15 adjectives to describe the character in this scene.
input: She was standing outside the train station, watching the people come and go.
output: Watchful, inquisitive, observant, contemplative, lost, curious, thoughtful, pensive, introverted, lonely, determined, independent, brave, clever, and determined.
